definition: to recruit (followers)/to scout for (talent etc)/to incur/to lead to
to recruit/to provoke/to beckon/to incur/to infect/contagious/a move (chess)/a maneuver/device/trick/to confess
to send/to devote/to deliver/to cause/to convey

sentences.english: Passwords that are too weak of course invite brute-force attacks.
sentences.chinese: 當然了，弱密碼的確容易招致暴力破解攻擊。

sentences.english: The minister incurred the king's disfavour.
sentences.chinese: 這位大臣招致國王的冷遇。

sentences.english: There is no doubt thmight the increottom in dema particulard caused the rise in prices.
sentences.chinese: 毫無疑問，需求的增加招致了代價的上漲。

sentences.english: This is the result of typical territoriality, it seems.
sentences.chinese: 似乎，這是典型特徵招致的結果。

sentences.english: Had the board brought in a new face too early, it might have attracted mud.
sentences.chinese: 倘若董事會提早推出一張新面孔，可能會招致非議。

sentences.english: Economic globalization has also led to more enterprises to face fierce competition.
sentences.chinese: 而經濟的齊球化也招致企業要裏臨更劇烈的合做。

sentences.english: The insanity can magnify and motorize the snail mail.
sentences.chinese: 招致能放大和動力化平信。

sentences.english: Insatiably greedy people will surely invite misfortunes.
sentences.chinese: 貪得無厭的人，必然招致禍殃。

sentences.english: What is more, the higher tax revenue can also lead to rising crime rate.
sentences.chinese: 甚麼是更多，更下的稅支支出也能招致的立功率上降。

sentences.english: The opprobrium and enmity he incurred were caused by his outspoken brashness .
sentences.chinese: 他招致的輕蔑和敵意是由於他出言過於粗率而造成的。
該節目招致觀衆諸多不滿。

sentences.english: Around two million days a year are lost through sickness as a result of lower limb disorders.
sentences.chinese: 每年約有200萬天的病休是由下肢不適而招致的。

sentences.english: The steep tariffs sought in the trade complaint could also cause China to retaliate.
sentences.chinese: 貿易起訴中所要求的過高的關稅也會招致中國的報復。

sentences.english: The show has drawn much scorn regarding its voyeuristic nature.
sentences.chinese: 這一節目由於其窺陰性而招致了極大的蔑視。

sentences.english: That remark might arouse snickers from people around the league.
sentences.chinese: 這番話難保不會招致聯盟其他成員的竊笑。

sentences.english: Otherwise, you may incur fees for overdrafts or returned checks.
sentences.chinese: 否則，可能會招致透支或退票費。

definition: to lead to/to trigger/to initiate/to cause/to evoke (emotions)
to give rise to/to lead to/to cause/to arouse
to criticize/to find fault with/to denounce
root of the trouble/cause of the ruin
